s0182.chinese: 始皇曰：「天下共苦戰鬬不休，以有侯王。
s0182.literal: The First Emperor said: "All under Heaven suffered bitterly from incessant warfare because of the existence of lords and kings.
s0182.idiomatic: The First Emperor said: "All under Heaven suffered bitterly from incessant warfare because of the existence of lords and kings.

s0183.chinese: 賴宗廟，天下初定，又復立國，是樹兵也，而求其寧息，豈不難哉！
s0183.literal: Relying on the ancestral temples, all under Heaven has just been pacified; if we again establish states, this is planting the seeds of war; to seek peace and tranquility would be truly difficult!
s0183.idiomatic: Relying on the ancestral temples, all under Heaven has just been pacified; if we again establish states, this is planting the seeds of war; to seek peace and tranquility would be truly difficult!

s0184.literal: The Commandant of Justice's argument is correct."
s0184.idiomatic: The Commandant of Justice's argument is correct."

s0186.chinese: 分天下以為三十六郡，郡置守、尉、監。
s0186.literal: He divided all under Heaven into thirty-six commanderies; each commandery had a governor, military commander, and supervisor.
s0186.idiomatic: He divided all under Heaven into thirty-six commanderies; each commandery had a governor, military commander, and supervisor.
